channel.title: RiyaScape[317]
channel.description:
Hey,
I've decided to make a server and host it for a little while and i'm looking for a development team to do it with.
I've had several ideas some of which i think may be unique to servers.
[ul][li]Home in Alkarid palace, works really well imo [/li] [li]I am going to use a system i call 'levels of the game' which takes advantage of the fact that heights -4, 0, 4 etc. are all the same except different 'levels of the game', so far i have implemented an admin home (height -4), a normal home (height 0) and a donator home (height 4) [/li][/ul]
[u][b]The team so far[/b][/u]
[ul][li]James (lon) (coder, admin) [Owner][/li] [li]Rob (Coder)[Co-Owner][/li] [li]Mod Zamorak (Tester, Coder)[/li] [li]Jasmus (Coder)[/li][/ul]
Join us now!:
[b][u]Currently needed skills:[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Coder with experience in server coding[/li]
[li]Coder with experience in web client creation[/li] [li]Modeler, good at using modeling software and must be able to work closely with client coder [/li] [li]More coders are always welcome, i will decide if you are qualified to work with us with rob[/li][/ul]
Some Pictures (May not be up to date as it is rapidly updating)
We now have a client! - [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/6yic85.jpg[/img]
Homes custom bank! [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2s63lo3.jpg[/img]
Shops so far, adding more as i type this in! [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2nvcc2h.jpg[/img]
Upstairs altar room and some more shops (may move these shops downstairs) [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/y1piv.jpg[/img]
This is the donator level of the game: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2l8kieg.jpg[/img]
If you would like to help me with the development of this server please contact me at jamesmaddison@hotmail.co.uk
[b][u]For an application please use the following format:[/b][/u] [code]Name (alias or irl): The position you want: How long have been doing things associated with your postion?: Do you think you can bring good ideas to this server?: [/code]
Thanks, James

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Looks ok for now. If you think that you won’t get the server finished on time just give me a message and I will help.

Read full topic

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

Sorry R A R E s we’re developing the server before we get into any of that stuff, but i’ll get back to you if we do need anything.

Read full topic

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

If you need a graphic designer or web page/forum editor/ creator then hit me back.

Read full topic

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

Currently i’m using a delta source, But the combat in my current source is poor other than that i’ve been happy with it, so i’m open to changing and it shouldn’t take long to port what i’ve already done to another source.

Read full topic

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

Um, looks interesting i guess. What base source are you using/planning to use?

Read full topic

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

I Think i will use an older game frame for the client as i think that’ll attract more players.

Read full topic

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You should create the client with the same 317-377 GameFrame. You will be loved from a lot of people with doing just that. Good luck with the development though.

Read full topic

item.title: RiyaScape[317]
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Jammydee, post:3, topic:376480”] Very funny

I’ve not coded the client yet i’m doing the server first, so i’m using the moparscape client to play but i will code a client.[/quote]That wasn’t sarcasm, I do like it. It’s old school.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:

I’ve not coded the client yet i’m doing the server first, so i’m using the moparscape client to play but i will code a client.
